body: I am aagrant99 a user who spends a gargantuan amount of time on Avicus forums, avicus skype forensics team, and Team speak 3 caucus if you briefly want to quickly know me if you we have not met already.  I am orchestrating new campaigns to reduce negativity and criticalitivity by the use of 're appealing to the masses with many new posts and speeches of advocatism and love distribution.  I will also focus on many works of literature relating to poetry, stories, expressive art, etc.  I hope you will enjoy this age of avicus enlightenment and will join in to ensure the basic principles and ideals are in place always.  Thank you,  Sincerely yours, aagrant99 (advocate for Avicus unification)
